Translations.Text: Nnan d imvebbôen imzuxiyen, n ugdud is,: "a k nessuffe$ a Cuâayeb, keçç, akked wid iumnen yidek, si temdint nne$, ne$ a d tu$alev ar ddin nne$". Inna: "xas nugi

Ihi, nger ed tikerkas $ef Öebbi, ma nu$al ar ddin nnwen, mbaâd ma Isellek a$ Öebbi, segs. Ur a$ ilaq ara a nu$al $uôes, siwa ma Irad Öebbi, Mass nne$. Mass nne$ Issemêalleq i yal cci s tmusni. Nepkel $ef Öebbi". A Mass nne$! Fru p garane$ akked ugdud nne$, s tidep. Keçç Tifev akw wid iferrun
Nnan imvebbôen, wid ijehlen, n ugdud is: "ma teddam d Cuâayeb, war ccekk a pxesôem
Tewwet iten zzenzla, gwran d, deg ixxamen nnsen, d loeppat
Wid iskaddben Cuâayeb, u$alen amzun ur zdi$en. Wid iskaddben Cuâayeb, d nitni ay d imexûuôen
Iwexxeô asen, u inna: "a yagdud iw! Ni$ ssawve$ awen d tibôatin n Mass iw, neûêe$ kwen. Amek ara $weble$ $ef ugdud ijehliyen
Ur Nuzen ara nnbi ar temdint, mebla ma Newwet imezda$ is s cedda, akked lemveôôa, amar ad êiwten
Sinna, Nerra ise$ deg umkan n tucmip, armi wexxôen, nnan: "ni$ jeôôben imezwura nne$ lemveôôa akked ttrika". Newwet iten deqzalla, nitni ur bnin
Lemmer kan uminen u êezzben imezda$ n temdinin, war ccekk, ad asen Nelli lbaôakat seg igenni akked tmurt. Maca, skaddben. Nessemêalleq asen, ilmend n wayen keppben
Day $ilen imezda$ n temdinin, ur ten id teppawev tiyta nne£, deg yiv, nitni îîsen
Ne$ day $ilen imezda$ n temdinin, ur ten id teppawev tiyta nne£, deg wazal, nitni ppuraren
Day $ilen sellken i tandit n Öebbi? Siwa agdud i ixesôen, i i$ilen sellken i tandit n Öebbi
Ne$ day ur d Iban ara, i wid ara iweôten tamurt, deffir imezda$ is, ar, ma ihwa ya£, a ten Newwet $ef ibekkaven nnsen, a Nesle$ ulawen nnsen, d$a nitni ur sellen
D timdinin agi, i$ef ak Nêekku, si teqûivin nnsent. Ni$ usan $uôsent imazanen nnsent, s ubeggen. Ur llint d tid ara iamnen deg wayen skaddbent uqbel. Akka i Iselle$ Öebbi ulawen ijehliyen
Ur Nufi nnesba ar tegwti nnsen. Nufa, tegwti nnsen, d iballa$en
Sinna, deffir sen, Nuzen ed Musa, s issekniyen nne£, ar Ferâun akked imvebbôen is. Densen ten. Wali amek tevôa d ifessaden
Inna Musa: "a Ferâun! Nek d amazan s$uô Mass imavalen
D ûûeê, ur qqaôe$, $ef Öebbi, siwa tidep. Ih, usi$ kwen id, s ubeggen n Mass nnwen. Ihi, azen yidi At Isôail
Inna: "ma tusiv d s ussekni, zzi t id, ma tessawalav tidep
Iveggeô taâkwazt is, appan d azrem n ûûeê
Issuffe$ ed afus is, iban ed d amellal i imnezhen
Nnan d imvebbôen n ugdud n Ferâun: "wagi, s tidep, d aseêêar amusnaw
Ib$a a kwen issuffe$ si tmurt nnwen, d acu t lameô nnwen
Nnan: "anef as, neppa akked gma s. Azen iberraêen ar temdinin
ad ak d awin yal aseêêar amusnaw
Usan d iseêêaren n Ferâun, nnan: "s tidep, ad a$ tkafiv, ma d nekwni ara i$elben
Inna: "ih, u, s tidep, a ppilim d iqôiben
Nnan: "a Musa! A pveggôev keçç, ne$ a nveggeô nekwni
Inna: "veggôet"! Mi veggôen, sdehcen allen n l$aci, ssagwden ten. Bbwin d ssêur anect ilat
Nweêêa i Musa: "veggeô taâkwazt ik"! Apan tesseblaâ ayen d ûenâan
Tûaô tidep, inqev wayen xeddmen
Akka ay pwa$elben. U$alen ar deffir, d unqisen
£lin iseêêaren, knan
Nnan: "numen s Mass imavalen
Mass n Musa akked Haôun
Inna Ferâun: "day tumnem yis, uqbel ma âammde$ awen? Ayagi, war ccekk, d tifxep. Tundim p di temdint, iwakken a ppessuff$em, segs, imezda$ is. Ihi, deqqal a ppeéôem
War ccekk, ad awen gezme$ afus ssya, avaô ssya. Sinna, ih, a kwen semmôe$ akw $ef imudag
Nnan: "nekwni a nu$al ar Mass nne
Terriv d ppaô segne$, imi kan numen s issekniyen n Mass nne$, mi $ d usan. A Mass nne$! Azen a$ d ûûbeô, Ddem leôwaê nne$ d imvuâen

Imvebbôen n ugdud n Ferâun, nnan: "day a ppeooev Musa akked ugdud is, ad ssefsaden di tmurt, a kwen ooen, keçç akked iôebbiten ik"? Inna: "a nene$ arrac nnsen, a nessider tilawin nnsen. Nekwni, sennig sen, d iqehhaôen
Inna Musa i ugdud is: "ppret afus n Öebbi, u ûebôet. Tamurt, war ccekk, n Öebbi. A p iwôet win i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS. Taggara i wid ipêezziben
Nnan: "njaf uqbel a $ d tasev, u deffir tisin ik". Inna: "amar Mass nnwen ad Ine$ acengu nnwen, a kwen Irr d igensas di tmurt, ad Iwali amek ara txedmem
Newwet, d$a, lois n Ferâun s iseggwasen n llaé, akked nneqs n ppemôa, amar a d mmektin
Ma iusa ten id ise$, ad inin: "nne$ wagi". Ma tusa ten id tucmip, a p sbibben i Musa akked wid illan yides. Ayen iveôôun yidsen, day maççi ar Öebbi kan? Maca, tegwti segsen ur ssinen
Nnan: " wicqa assekni ara d tawiv, ur a$ tepseêêirev yis. Nekwni, ur neppamen yisek
Nuzen asen aêemmal, ajôad, tilkin, imqweôqwôen, idammen, d issekniyen ifeûlen. Sme$wôen iman nnsen. Llan d agdud ibe$wviyen
Mi tevôa yidsen twa$it, qqaôen: "a Musa! Nâaô Mass ik i nekwni, s wayen i k Iâahed. Ma tekksev a$ tawa$it, a namen yisek, a nazen yidek At Isôail
Mi sen Nekkes tawa$it, ar lajel iten iggunin, atnan nitni xedâan
Nerra d segsen ppaô, N$emq iten deg ill, imi skaddben issekniyen nne£, ur d celâen degsen
Nessewôet i ugdud i illan qehôen t, igmav akked ituram n tmurt, i Neôqa. Itam wawal ûûam n Mass ik, $ef At Isôail, ilmend n wayen ûebôen. Nhudd ayen iûennaâ Ferâun akked ugdud is, u wayen bennun
Nesâadda ill i At Isôail. Mmugren d agdud i iâabden tiâancuôin is. Nnan: "a Musa! Err ane$ ôebbi am iôebbiten nnsen". Inna: "kunwi, s tidep, d agdud ur nessin
Wigi, s tidep, ad inger wayen ideg llan, ad inqev wayen xeddmen
Inna: "day awen budde$ ôebbi, war Öebbi, u Neppa Ismenyaf ikwen $ef imavalen
Mi kwen Nsellek si lois n Ferâun, sukken fellawen aâaqeb uqsiê mavi; neqqen arrac nnwen, ssidiren tilawin nnwen. Deg waya, ajeôôeb s$uô Mass nnwen ameqwôaêan
Nemlal akked Musa kravet wavan, Nerna yasen mraw. Tebbwev tallit n Mass is, kuzet wavan. Inna Musa i gma s Haôun: "enûef iyi ar ugdud iw, exdem ayen ilhan, ur teddu d ubrid ifessaden

Mi d iusa Musa ar temlilit nne£, u Immeslay as Mass is, inna: "a Mass iw! Ssenâat iyi d, a K wali$". Inna d: "ur iyI tepwaliv, d awez$i, maca muqel s adrar. Ma iqqim deg umekkan is, ad iyI twaliv". Mi d Iusa Mass is s adrar, Irra t d saêel. I$li Musa, ixsef. Mi d iuki, inna: "gedha s yiseK! Utube$ K, nek d amezwaru n lmumnin
Inna: "a Musa! Aql I Smenyafe$ k $ef imdanen, i tebôatin iW, i wawal iW. Ddem ayen i k d Fki$, ili seg wid isnemmiren
Nura yas, di tlewêin, si yal cci, anabi akked ufeûûel n yal cci. Ddem itent s tezmert, ameô i ugdud ik a tent iîîef s lmaâna nnsent. Ad awen Ssekne$ tanezdu$t iballa$en

Ad Veôôfe$, seg issekniyen iW, wid isme$wôen iman nnsen di tmurt, war ssebba. Mi walan yal assekni, ur ppamnen yis. Ma walan abrid uûwib, ur teddun degs. Ma walan abrid n le$wlav, a t awin. Ayagi, acku, s tidep, skaddben issekniyen nne£, ur d celâen degsen
Wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, akked temlilit n laxeôt, ur swin igiten nnsen. Day a ten kafin $ef wayen ur nelli d ayen xeddmen
Agdud n Musa, deffir es, isbedd, s ôôêuê is, aâjmi bu loeppa isrugmuten. Day ur walan ara ar, s tidep, ur asen d ipmeslay, ur la ten inehhu s abrid? Âabden t, llan d imednas
Mi ppuêeccmen, u walan ar, zi$ nnetlafen, nnan: "ma ur Iêun ara fella$ Mass nne$, ma ur a$ Isemmeê ara, war ccekk, a nu$al seg imexsuôen

Mi d iu$al Musa ar ugdud is, s wurrif akked lêemûa, inna: "ay d ucmit wayen is iyi tneûfem, deffir iw! Teb$am a d i$iwwel lameô n Mass nnwen"? Iveggeô tilewêin, iîîef gma s seg uqeôôu, ijebt it id $uôes. Inna d: "a mmi s n yimma, s tidep, iêqeô iyi ugdud, qôib iyi n$an. Ur ssefôaê icenga yissi. Ur iyi pparra seg ugdud imednas
Inna: "a Mass iw! Semmeê ane$, nek akked gma, Ssekcem a$ ar uêunu K. Keçç, Tifev akw wid ipêunun
Ih, wid iâabden aâajmi, a d i$li fellasen wurrif n Mass nnsen, ad ndellen di tmeddurt n ddunit. Akka ay Nepqeîîi wid id isnulfuyen
Wid ixedmen tucmitin, sinna, steôoâen deffir sent, u umnen, Mass ik, s tidep, deffir sent, ar Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
Mi irs wurrif is, iddem ed Musa tilewêin. Di tira nnsent, nnhaya akked uêunu i wid ippagwaden Mass nnsen

Ifren ed Musa ûatet irgazen seg ugdud is, ad mlilen yidne£. Mi ten tewwet zzenzla, inna: "a Mass iw! Lemmer i K ihwi, yili, iu$ lêal, Ten$iv ten, u Tegliv yissi. Day ad a$ Temêuv, ilmend n wayen xedmen ije$lufen segne$? Wagi d ahewwel iK kan, Tettellifev syis win i K ihwan, Tnehhuv win i K ihwan. Keçç d Bab nne$, Semmeê a$, Ëun fella$, Keçç Tifev akw wid ipsemmiêen

Aru ya$ ise$ di ddunit, di laxeôt; aql a$ nu$al ed $uôeK". Inna d: "aâaqeb iW, a t Sâaddi$ $ef win iyI ihwan. Aêunu W ijemmel yal cci. A t Aru$ i wid ipêezziben, ipzekkin, akked wid iumnen s issekniyen nne£

wid iteddun d Umazan, Nnbi ur ne$ôi, i ufan iura $uôsen di Tuôa akked Linoil". Iumeô asen d lqanun, Itekkes asen ayen n dir. Iêell asen lâali, igdel asen dduni. Ikkes asen aruz akked lqid nnsen. Ihi, wid iumnen yis, i t iâawnen, i t isellken, iddan d tafat id irsen yides, widak d imerbaê

Ini: "a yimdanen! Nek d Amazan n Öebbi $uôwen meôôa. Neppa, ineS tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan. Ur illi ôebbi siwa Neppa. Issidir, Ineqq". Ihi, amnet s Öebbi akked Umazan iS, Nnbi ur ne$ôi, i iumnen s Öebbi akked wawal iS. Ddut yides, amar a ppepwanhum
Deg ugdud n Musa, arbaâ iteddu s tidep. U syis ay pêuddun

Nessemfaôaq iten $ef mrawsin laâôac, n leoyus. Mi s issuter ugdud is tissit, Nweêêa i Musa: ewwet aéôu s tâakwaz ik. F$ent ed segs mrawsnat tliwa; akka, yal amdan iéôa anda ara issew. Nesbur iten s usigna, Nessers asen d lmenna akked ifeôôuoen: "eççet seg wayen ilhan, is ikwen N$at". Ur a£ dnisen, maca la ddennisen iman nnsen
Mi pwanecden: "zed$et di temdint agi, eççet segs, ayen i wen ihwan, init: "laâfu"! Âaddit di tebburt, s lekni. Ad awen Nsemmeê tuccva nnwen. A Nernu i lâuûam
Wid idensen segsen, neûfen awalen s wid ur nelli d wid i sen nnan. Nuzen asen tiyta seg igenni, ilmend n wayen ddennisen
Steqsi ten $ef temdint i illan $ef rrif n yill, mi ur d rzin di ssebt, mi ten id usan iselman nnsen, walan ten, ass n ssebt. Ass, war ssebt, ur ten id ppasen. Akka ay ten Njeôôeb, deg wayen ssexsaôen
Mi d inna lois, segsen: "iwumi la tepnabim agdud ara Isqucc Öebbi, ne$ ara Iâaqeb s leqseê"? Nnan: "d aste$feô ar Mass nnwen, amar ad êezzben
Mi ppun ayen i$ef pwafekkôen, Nsellek wid itekksen ayen n dir, Nesâadda aâaqeb adiran $ef imednas, ilmend n wayen ssexsaôen
Mi sme$wôen iman nnsen $ef wayen i sen ipwakksen, Nenna yasen: "ilit d uddawen ucmiten
Mi Ixebbeô Mass ik, ard asen d Iazen ara ten iâaqben, s ééuô, alamma d ass n tnekra. Mass ik, s tidep, Ip$awal ar uâaqeb. Neppa, s tidep, Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
Nessemfaôaq iten di tmurt, d leoyus, garasen wid imaânen, garasen wid ur nemâin. Njeôôeb iten s ise$iyen akked tucmitin, amar a d u$alen s abrid

Neûfen ten, deffir sen, ineûûafen i iweôten Tazmamt. Ppaddamen lerbaê n ddunit, qqaôen: "ad a$ semmêen". Ma rnan usan ten id lerbaê, am widen, a ten ddmen. Day ur âahden ara s Tezmamt, ard tidep kan, ara inin $ef Öebbi? U lemden i illan degs. Ppif axxam aneggaru, i wid ipêezziben. Day ur tfehmem ara
Wid iîîfen di Tezmamt, ipéallan, s tidep, ur Nveggiâ arraz n lâuûam
Mi Nessuli adrar sennig sen, amzun d tili, $ilen, s tidep, ara d i$li fellasen. Ïîfet nezzeh ayen i wen Nefka, smektit ed ayen illan degs, amar a pêezzbem

Mi d Iddem Mass ik, si tgeééal n tarwa n Adem, dderya nnsen, Inna yasen a d cehhden $ef yiman nnsen: "day ur Lli$ ara d Mass nnwen"? Nnan: "ih, ncehhed". Akka ur d teqqaôem ara, ass n tnekra: "s tidep, ayagi d ayen ur neéôi
Ne$ a d tinim: "d imezwura nne$ kan i icurken, zik. Nekwni d tarwa deffir sen. Day a$ Ten$ev, ilmend n wayen xedmen wid iôejjnen
Akka ay Nfeûûel issekniyen, amar a d u$alen s abrid
Eêku yasen d tadyant n win iwumi Nefka issekniyen nne£. Irra ten akin. Idda yides Cciîan, iu$al seg wid i$eôqen

Lemmer i £ ihwi, Nessuli t yissen. Maca, ib$a tamurt, idda d lhawiyya s. Ihi, amedya s am win n waydi, ma teddiv p fellas, ad ilehhet, ma teooiv t, ad ilehhet. D wagi ay d amedya n ugdud i iskaddben issekniyen nne£. Eêku d tadyant, amar a d mmektin
Agdud iskaddben issekniyen nne£, d yir amedya. Pddennisen iman nnsen
Win Inha Öebbi, ihi, idda d ubrid. Wid Itlef Öebbi, nitni d imexsuôen

Ni$ Neswejd ed, i Loahennama, aîas n leonun akked yimdanen. Sâan ulawen, ur fehhmen yissen; sâan allen, ur pwalin yissent; sâan imeééu$en, ur sellen yissen. Nitni am lmal, ne$ nnetlafen kteô. Wigi d i$wefliyen
I Öebbi, ismawen ûûam. Naâôet eP, yissen. Veôôfet seg wid issexsaôen ismawen iS. Ad ppuqeîîin $ef wayen xeddmen
Deg wayen Nexleq, yiwen n lois ivfeô tidep. Ipêuddu syis
Wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, a ten Nawi, cwiî, cwiî, ar wanda ur éôin
Ad asen Fke$ lmudda. Ih, ticeôkep iW d tunûiêt
Day ur d tepmeyyizem ara? Ur illi umeddakwel nnwen d aôehbani. Neppa, d aneddaô kan ipbegginen
Day ur walan ara tagelda n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen Ixleq Öebbi n cci? Ni$, ahat, iqeôb ed lajel nnsen. Anwa awal, deffir wagi, ar amnen
Win Itlef Öebbi, ur Isâi nnahi. A ten Ioo ad hemlen di tjehli nnsen

A k steqsayen $ef yimir, melmi ara d yili. Ini: "i t Iéôan siwa Mass iw. D Neppa kan a t id Isseknen, di lweqt is. Ad iaéay di tmurt akked igenwan. Ur kwen id ippawev siwa deqzalla". A k steqsayen amzun tesâiv asali fellas. Ini: "i t Issnen siwa ÔÖebbi", maca tegwti n yimdanen ur ssinen
Ini: "ur ksibe$ i iman iw, aba$uô ne$ vveôô, kkes ed ayen Irad Öebbi. Lemmer ssine$ tabavnit, ad ôwu$ lxiô, ur iyi ipnal ixmiô. Nek d aneddaô kan, u d abcir, i ugdud iumnen

D Neppa ikwen id Ixelqen si yiwen n yiman. Iddem ed segs tameîîut is, ad izde$ yides. Mi insa yides, tebbwi tadist tafessast; telêa yis. Mi d teûbeê ééayet, naâôen Öebbi: "a Mass nne$! Ma Tefkiv a$ d aâeôvi, war ccekk, a nili seg wid isnemmiren
Mi sen d Ifka aâeôdi, rran aS icriken s wayen i sen d Ifka. I aâlay Öebbi, sennig wayen pcaraken
Day ad carken ayen ur nexliq acemma, u d nitni i ipwaxelqen
Ur zmiren a ten âiwnen, ne$ ad âiwnen iman nnsen
Ma tnecdem ten ar nnhaya, ur teddun yidwen. Iâuva fellawen ma tnecdem ten, ne$ ma tessusmem
S tidep, wigi tnaâôem, war Öebbi, d imdanen am kunwi. Naâret pen, ma ad awen d rren, maday tessawalem tidep

Day sâan ivaôen, ad lêun fellasen, ne$ sâan ifassen, ad ddmen yissen, ne$ sâan allen, ad walin yisent, ne$ sâan imeééu$en, ad slen yissen. Ini: "naâret icriken nnwen, sinna, andit iyi. Ur iyi sganayet
Ih, Bab iw d Öebbi id Issersen Tazmamt, i Iêemmlen lâuûam
Wid tnaâôem, war Neppa, ur zmiren a kwen âawnen, ne$ ad âawnen iman nnsen
Ma tnecdem ten ar nnhaya, ur sellen. A ten twaliv a k id pmuqulen, nitni ur pwalin
Ddem ayen ilhan, ameô ar lewqama, veôôef i wid ur nessin
Ma ilaâj ik Cciîan ar dduni, ppkel $ef Öebbi. Neppa, s tidep, Issel, d Amusnaw
Ih, wid ipêezziben, ma innul iten urbaâ n ccwaîen, a d mmektin, d$a ad asen llint wallen
Zgan $elîen atmaten nnsen, d$a nitni ur xevvun
Ma ur asen d tebbwiv ara assekni, ad ak inin: "acimi ur t id isnulfa ara"? Ini: "teddu$ kan d wayen iyi d ippuweêêan, s$uô Mass iw". Wagi, s$uô Mass nnwen, d tafat, d nnhaya, d aêunu, i ugdud iumnen
Ma qqaôen Leqwôan ssemêesset as, ssusmet, amar fellawen aêunu
Mmekti d Mass ik, deg iman ik, s wannuz akked lxuf, s wawal irsen, taûebêit, tameddit. Ur ppili seg i$wefliyen
Ih, wid illan ar Mass ik, ur sme$wôen ara iman nnsen, $ef uâbad iS. Sbuccuâen T, i Neppa kennun
Steqsan k $ef rrbeê. Ini: "rrbeê i Öebbi akked Umazan. Ihi, êezzbet i Öebbi, elhut garawen, a$et awal i Öebbi akked Umazan iS, ma d lmumnin ay tellam
Lmumnin d wid kan iwumi ippergigi wul nnsen, ma Ipwabder ed Öebbi. Ma $ôan asen issekniyen iS, ad innerni liman nnsen. £ef Mass nnsen, ay ppeklen
Wid ibedden i téallit, ipûeôôifen seg wayen is iten N$at
Wigi d ûûeê, d lmumnin. I nitni, ar Mass nnsen, tiseddaôin, ssmaê, akked l$it uùkyis
Akken ik id Issuffe$ Mass ik, seg uxxam ik, s tidep, wanag ur ib$i urbaâ si lmumnin
La k pnamaren $ef tidep, deffir ubeggen is, amzun kan pwanehôen ar tmeppant, nitni pêekkiôen
Mi wen Iâahed Öebbi, ara ppili nnwen, yiwet si snat n trebbuyaâ, tessarmem a ppili nnwen tin ur nepwaselleê. Öebbi Ib$a a d itebbet tidep s wawalen iS, ad ôéen wakali ijehliyen
A ppili tidep, ad inqev lbaîel, xas ugin ibe$wviyen
Mi tepprem afus s$uô Mass nnwen, Ijaweb awen d: "Nek ad awen Fke$ agim lmalayek, mestebâant
Irra t kan Öebbi d abecceô iwakken ad nnevmanen yis wulawen nnwen. Ur illi l$elb, siwa s$uô Öebbi. Öebbi, s tidep, d Uzmir, d Bab n ûûwab
Mi kwen I$umm s yives, d îîmana s$uôeS; Isse$li d fellawen aman seg igenni; a kwen Izzizdeg yissen, ad Issebâad, fellawen, a$way n Cciîan, ad Isseohed ulawen nnwen, ad Itebbet, yissen, isurifen
Mi Iweêêa Mass ik i lmalayek: "Nek yidkwent; tebbtemt wid iumnen. Ad Skecme$ tugdi deg ulawen n wid ijehlen. Ewwtemt sennig tmegrav, ewwtemt ar ixfawen ivudan
Ayagi, acku nitni, s tidep, xuûmen Öebbi akked Umazan iS. I win ixuûmen Öebbi akked Umazan iS, ihi, Öebbi Iwâaô deg uâaqeb
Wagi i kunwi, jeôôbet ep! U i ijehliyen, aâaqeb n tmes
A wid iumnen! Ma temmugrem d wid ijehlen la d éeddmen, ur sen reggwlet
Win i sen irewlen, assen, siwa ma la issewjad i umennu$, ne$ ma ikcem s arbaâ, winna, a t immager wurrif n Öebbi; axxam is d Loahennama, a yir tu$alin
Ur ten tennu$em, maca d Öebbi iten Innu$en. Ur teôoimev mi tôeomev, maca Öebbi Iôoem, iwakken ad Ijeôôeb lmumnin s ujeôôeb umâin s$uôeS. Öebbi, s tidep, Issel, d Amusnaw
